title: Tiller Cover — Seadate
body: Replacement tiller cover to improve protection and appearance.
Sized and patterned to suit existing hardware and geometry.

title: Console Cover — Aussie Whaler
excerpt: New console cover to protect electrics.
body: Custom console cover to shield electronics from UV and spray.
Quick on/off design to support frequent use.

title: Cockpit Rope Bags — Seadate
excerpt: Replace four cockpit rope bags; two are in very poor condition.
body: Set of four replacement rope bags for cockpit management.
Two bags prioritised due to condition; remaining two scheduled as follow-ups.

title: Boom Cover — Seadate
excerpt: Upgrade to match boat colours and build portfolio.
body: Boom cover upgrade aligned to vessel colourway.
Focused on clean finish, durability and easy handling.

title: Console Cover — Highfield RIB
excerpt: Console cover for Ed & Nicole’s RIB.
body: Protective console cover patterned for Highfield console geometry.
Aims to reduce UV exposure and weather ingress when moored.

title: Hatch Covers — First Picasso
excerpt: Custom hatch covers for protection and clean water shedding.
body: Tailored hatch covers for consistent UV protection and drainage.
Patterned to suit hatch layout with reinforced wear points.

title: Spinnaker Pole Bag — Time Bandit
body: Purpose-built pole bag for protection and organised stowage.
Sized for deck hardware clearances and frequent handling.

title: Boom Cover — Pretty Woman
excerpt: Replacement boom cover; clips underside, zip to front.
body: Replacement boom cover with underside clip system and forward zip.
Designed for neat fit, quick removal and long service life.

title: Furler Cover — Cooloola
excerpt: Protective neoprene sleeve to prevent deck impact during sail changes.
body: Neoprene furler sleeve to protect teak deck from impact and scuffing.
Quick fit/removal with closure suited to on-water changes.
